Base¶

class games.base.ConsumerUpdater¶

Base class for a Game Updater

classmethod function_router(text_json: dict) → dict¶

Routes the request to the correct function

Parameters

text_json – Request dictionary

Returns

dictionary returned by called function

class games.base.Game(session_id: uuid.UUID)¶

Interface for all OnlineCasino games

  • in_limbo is a set for players trying to join a game. This takes care of the issue that players would be removed from the session when reloading the page

add_player(player: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Adds a player to the game

Parameters

player – player to be added

add_to_limbo(user: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Adds a player to the limbo set

Parameters

user – the player to be added

add_to_spectating(user: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Adds a player to the spectating set

Parameters

user – the player to be added

remove_from_limbo(user: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Removes a player from the limbo set if they are in it

Parameters

user – the player to be removed

remove_from_spectating(user: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Removes a player from the spectating set if they are in it

Parameters

user – the player to be removed

remove_player(player: accounts.models.CustomUser)¶

Removes a player from the game of they are in it

Parameters

player – player to be removed

class games.base.GameConsumer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Base Consumer class for all game’s web socket connections

connect() → None¶

Handles connecting a user to game channel and registering them for the session when a user connects to the web socket

disconnect(code: int) → None¶

Handles removing a user from the game channel and removing them from the session when a player navigates away from the game web page

Parameters

code – exit code

receive(text_data: Optional[str] = None, bytes_data: Optional[bytes] = None) → None¶

Called when the web socket receives a message from the user

Parameters

  • text_data – received string message

  • bytes_data – received bytes message

send_message(event: dict) → None¶

Sends a message to this web socket connection

Parameters

event – Event to send. Data must be under ‘data’ key

session_empty() → bool¶
Returns

whether there are players connected to the websocket

class games.base.GameSessionView(**kwargs)¶

Base class view for the available session page of each game

get(request: django.core.handlers.wsgi.WSGIRequest, *args, **kwargs) → django.http.response.HttpResponse¶

Handles the GET request

Parameters

request – WSGIRequest object containing the request information

Returns

An HttpResponse object rendering the page

class games.base.SessionManager(game_class: type, game)¶

Manager for all sessions of a game type

create() → uuid.UUID¶

Creates a new session

Returns

UUID of the newly created session

delete(uuid: uuid.UUID) → games.base.Game¶

Deletes a game session

Parameters

uuid – UUID of the game to delete

Returns

the deleted game

get(uuid: uuid.UUID) → games.base.Game¶

Returns the requested game

Parameters

uuid – UUID of the requested game

Returns

the requested game

get_players_game(player: accounts.models.CustomUser) → uuid.UUID¶

Registers a users session if they are in the game

Parameters

player – player to get the session for

Returns

session_id of the player if they are playing the game. None otherwise

list_sessions() → dict¶

Returns a dictionary of each session and the number of players in that session

Returns

dict of all sessions

register_user(uuid: uuid.UUID, user: accounts.models.CustomUser, spectating: bool = False) → None¶

Registers a user to a specified session

Parameters

  • uuid – UUID of the session to register the user for

  • user – User to add to the session

  • spectating – If the user is spectating the game

remove_user(uuid: uuid.UUID, user: accounts.models.CustomUser) → None¶

Removes a user from a specified session

Parameters

  • uuid – UUID of the session to remove the user from

  • user – User to remove from the session

session_exists(uuid: uuid.UUID) → bool¶

Checks to see if the passed session exists

Parameters

uuid – UUID of the session to check

Returns

true if the session exists
